events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I bought last week because it does not fit as expected and I want to return it.
The case was reviewed and categorized as a refund request due to the customer wanting to return the purchase.
An available agent has been assigned to handle the refund request promptly and assist the customer accordingly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. Let me assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund as quickly as possible?
Sure, my order number is 4587239. The jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size, so I want to return it and get my money back.

Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label, and once received, your money will be refunded within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund payment and to check if you need any further assistance from us.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been completed successfully. Please contact us anytime if you need further support.
